titleStmt.title: A Serious answer to a late book stiled, A reply to Mr. Robert Steed's epistle concerning singing wherein the chief scriptures and arguments are examined, and the weakness thereof shewed : together with an answer to the several reflections, and false charges, against both churches and persons, recommended to the elders, ministers, and members of baptized churches.
titleStmt.author: Kiffin, William, 1616-1701.
Steed, Robert, of Dartmouth.
Barrett, George.
E. M. (Edward Man)

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 64 by: William Kiffin, Robert Steed, George Barrett, and Edward Man.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
